entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
